name: Hobbledy-Hoy
description:
This is how the ladies ride: prim, prim, prim.
This is how the gentlemen ride: trim, trim, trim.
This is how the country-folk ride: hobbledy-hoy, hobbledy-hoy.

This print is an interpretation of the old mother goose rhyme "Hobbledy-Hoy". The original watercolour painting was inspired by beautiful medieval manuscripts.

It is giclée printed on acid free Somerset Velvet Enhanced 330 gsm, 100% cotton, which is an exceptionally heavy and luxurious paper; it makes the print look as good as the original. The stars in the sky are hand embellished with 24k gold leaf. This print is gorgeous!

Each print is lovingly signed and numbered by Jane Heinrichs. It is an exclusive edition of 50 prints.

Mounted in a beautiful thick white mount and backed with archival foam-core.

Image size: 18.5cm by 13.5 cm. Mount size: 28.5cm by 25cm.

It is shipped from the UK in a protective bubble-padded envelope. I send my prints off to their happy new home within 1-3 days of payment. Enjoy!

name: Queen of Hearts
description:
The Queen of Hearts, she baked some tarts
All on a summer's day.
The Knave of Hearts, he stole the tarts
And took them clean away.
The King of Hearts called for the tarts
And beat the knave full sore.
The Knave of Hearts brought back the tarts
And swore he'd steal no more.

This print is an interpretation of the old mother goose rhyme "The Queen of Hearts". The original watercolour painting was inspired by beautiful medieval manuscripts.

It is giclée printed on acid free Somerset Velvet Enhanced 330 gsm, 100% cotton, which is an exceptionally heavy and luxurious paper; it makes the print look as good as the original. The stars in the sky are hand embellished with 24k gold leaf. This print is gorgeous!

Each print is lovingly signed and numbered by Jane Heinrichs. It is an exclusive edition of 50 prints.

Mounted in a beautiful thick white mount and backed with archival foam-core.

Image size: 18.5cm by 13.5 cm. Mount size: 28.5cm by 25cm.

It is shipped from the UK in a protective bubble-padded envelope. I send my prints off to their happy new home within 1-3 days of payment. Enjoy!

name: Magic at the Museum
description:
"It is Anne's birthday. Her mother takes her to a museum and gives her a necklace. Anne does not want to look at the paintings in the quiet gallery; she wants her cake. She falls asleep and encounters the best birthday party of all."

A book about art and generosity.

This is a book I wrote and illustrated. It was printed and bound in a limited edition and was short-listed for "best illustrated book" at the Manitoba Book Awards.

It will be shipped signed by me, the author and illustrator, with the original pen I used to do the drawings. If you want a personal message, please write it in the special instructions when you check out. I'd be happy to personalize a copy just for you!

It is 32 pages, hardcover and suitable for children 3-9. Or for art lovers of all ages.

It will ship within 1-3 days of purchase in a bubble-wrap envelope.

Much love!
